languages.text: "Выглядит так, что еретики намеренно охотились за командованием и прекрасно знали, кого и где искать. Что неудивительно, учитывая, что их информатором на борту был Мастер шепотов..." {n}Абеляр кривится.{/n}

"It appears the heretics were deliberately targeting the vessel's command — they knew exactly whom they were looking for and where they could be found. Which is unsurprising, given that their informant on board was our own Master of Whispers..." {n}Abelard grimaces.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Выглядит так, что еретики намеренно охотились за командованием и прекрасно знали, кого и где искать. Что неудивительно, учитывая, что их информатором на борту был Мастер шепотов..." {n}Абеляр кривится.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "It appears the pirates were deliberately targeting the vessel's command — they knew exactly whom they were looking for and where they could be found. Which is unsurprising, giving that their informant on board was our own Master of Whispers..." {n}Abelard grimaces.{/n}

"It appears the pirates were deliberately targeting the vessel's command — they knew exactly whom they were looking for and where they could be found. Which is unsurprising, giving that their informant on board was our own Master of Whispers..." {n}Abelard grimaces.{/n}

"It appears the pirates were deliberately targeting the vessel's command — they knew exactly whom they were looking for and where they could be found. Which is unsurprising, giving that their informant on board was our own Master of Whispers..." {n}Abelard grimaces.{/n}

"It appears the heretics were deliberately targeting the vessel's command — they knew exactly whom they were looking for and where they could be found. Which is unsurprising, given that their informant on board was our own Master of Whispers..." {n}Abelard grimaces.{/n}

"It appears the heretics were deliberately targeting the vessel's command — they knew exactly whom they were looking for and where they could be found. Which is unsurprising, given that their informant on board was our own Master of Whispers..." {n}Abelard grimaces.{/n}

languages.text: “看起来，那些异端分子当时袭击的目标就是这艘船的指挥中枢。他们很清楚他们的目标有哪些人，也很清楚该去哪里找到他们。这并不奇怪，毕竟他们在船上的内应，就是我们的低语之主……”{n}阿贝拉德露出了痛苦的表情。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It appears the heretics were deliberately targeting the vessel's command — they knew exactly whom they were looking for and where they could be found. Which is unsurprising, given that their informant on board was our own Master of Whispers..." {n}Abelard grimaces.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “看起来，海盗当时袭击的目标就是这艘船的指挥中枢。他们很清楚他们的目标有哪些人，也很清楚该去哪里找到他们。这并不奇怪，毕竟他们在船上的内应，就是我们的低语之主……”{n}阿贝拉德露出了痛苦的表情。{/n}

languages.text: "Die Ketzer haben anscheinend gezielt die höheren Ränge des Schiffs angegriffen – sie wussten genau, wen sie suchten und wo sie suchen mussten. Was keine Überraschung ist, war ihr Informant an Bord doch unser eigener Meister des Geflüsters ..." {n}Abelard verzieht das Gesicht.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It appears the heretics were deliberately targeting the vessel's command — they knew exactly whom they were looking for and where they could be found. Which is unsurprising, given that their informant on board was our own Master of Whispers..." {n}Abelard grimaces.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Die Piraten haben anscheinend gezielt die höheren Ränge des Schiffs angegriffen – sie wussten genau, wen sie suchten und wo sie suchen mussten. Was keine Überraschung ist, war ihr Informant an Bord doch unser eigener Meister des Geflüsters ..." {n}Abelard verzieht das Gesicht.{/n}

languages.text: « De toute évidence, les hérétiques ont délibérément visé le commandement du vaisseau. Ils savaient exactement qui ils cherchaient et où trouver leurs victimes. Ce qui n'a rien d'étonnant, puisque leur informateur à bord n'était autre que notre propre maître des murmures... » {n}Abélard esquisse une grimace.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It appears the heretics were deliberately targeting the vessel's command — they knew exactly whom they were looking for and where they could be found. Which is unsurprising, given that their informant on board was our own Master of Whispers..." {n}Abelard grimaces.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « De toute évidence, les pirates ont délibérément visé le commandement du vaisseau. Ils savaient exactement qui ils cherchaient et où trouver leurs victimes. Ce qui n'a rien d'étonnant, puisque leur informateur à bord n'était autre que notre propre maître des murmures... » {n}Abélard grimace.{/n}

languages.text: 「異端者達は、意図的に船の司令部を狙っていたようです。探し人と、その居場所を正確に把握していたのでしょう。驚きはしませんね。船に乗っていた情報提供者が、こちら側の囁きの主だったことを考えれば…」{n}アベラルドの表情が曇る。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It appears the heretics were deliberately targeting the vessel's command — they knew exactly whom they were looking for and where they could be found. Which is unsurprising, given that their informant on board was our own Master of Whispers..." {n}Abelard grimaces.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「異端者達は、意図的に船の司令部を狙っていたようです。探し人と、その居場所を正確に把握していたのでしょう。驚きはしませんね。船に乗っていた情報提供者が、こちら側の囁きの主だったことを考えれば…」{n}アベラルドの表情が曇る。{/n}

languages.text: «Parece que los herejes atacaron intencionadamente al mando de la nave: sabían exactamente a quién buscaban y dónde golpear. Lo que no debe sorprendernos, ya que su informante a bordo era nuestro propio maestro de susurros...». {n}Abelard hace una mueca.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It appears the heretics were deliberately targeting the vessel's command — they knew exactly whom they were looking for and where they could be found. Which is unsurprising, given that their informant on board was our own Master of Whispers..." {n}Abelard grimaces.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Parece que los piratas atacaron intencionadamente al mando de la nave: sabían exactamente a quién buscaban y dónde golpear. Lo que no debe sorprendernos, ya que su informante a bordo era nuestro propio maestro de susurros...». {n}Abelard hace una mueca.{/n}

languages.text: "Anlaşılan kâfirler, mahsus gemi komutasını hedef almış. Kimi, nerede bulabileceklerine kadar biliyorlarmış. Gemideki muhbirlerinin özbeöz Fısıltı Üstadımız olduğu düşünülünce şaşırtıcı değil gerçi." {n}Abelard, yüzünü buruşturuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It appears the heretics were deliberately targeting the vessel's command — they knew exactly whom they were looking for and where they could be found. Which is unsurprising, given that their informant on board was our own Master of Whispers..." {n}Abelard grimaces.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Anlaşılan kâfirler, mahsus gemi komutasını hedef almış. Kimi, nerede bulabileceklerine kadar biliyorlarmış. Gemideki muhbirlerinin özbeöz Fısıltı Üstadı'mız olduğu düşünülünce şaşırtıcı değil gerçi." {n}Abelard, yüzünü buruşturuyor.{/n}
